dcm-ui.position

The dcm-ui.position module sets positional info for an element to a variable

requires: jquery

Components

Directive

Name Description
dcmPosition

Provides positional info for an element

Service

Name Description
dcmWindowInfo

Returns an object containing the width and height of the current browser window

Example

<div class="container">

  <span dcm-position="thisPosition" class="positionedBox">
    {{thisPosition | json}}
  </span>

  <span dcm-position="thisPosition2" class="positionedBox2">
    {{thisPosition2 | json}}
  </span>

</div>
.container {
  position: relative;
  height: 400px;
}

.positionedBox {
  position: absolute;
  top: 25px;
  left: 25px;
  border: 1px dashed red;
  padding: 20px;
}

.positionedBox2 {
  position: absolute;
  top: 100px;
  left: 150px;
  border: 1px dashed red;
  padding: 20px;
}
